text.__SUMMARY__: Pleurotus australis, the brown oyster mushroom, is a gilled fungus native to Australia and New Zealand.  It is found on dead wood.  Although morphologically similar to some other Pleurotus fungi, it has been shown to be a distinct species incapable of cross-breeding.
